nodes.bodyText: Is this implementation actually exactly the same as the HashSetMetaStore in the test? If so maybe we only need 1 of these?
looks like so. Then we should dedup and keep one impl DefaultMetaStore.
We can reuse the DefaultMetaStore in tests for now, but it is likely we will have to reintroduce the test implementation as the DefaultMetaStore become more complex.
if that's the case we can keep them separate.

is this class thread safe? If yes, please annotate it with @ThreadSafe; if not, currently LocalCacheManager does not provide any guard to protect concurrent access to this evictor from multiple threads.

nodes.bodyText: I would suggest to add user-facing propertyKey like alluxio.user.client.cache.evictor and allow to select different evictors (thought currently we have only one). This will make it easier to switch cache replacement policy without recompiling the src code

Shall we cover the following cases:

evict before any other operations (just make sure we don't see NPE)
evict after all pages are put and then deleted
I think you want null instead of empty arrays?
can you mark this method and the interface def with @Nullable
